Text: Where is the blu-ray release from? Thanks for the torrent.

I have no idea CochiseGuy. Try to find out on amazon dot com. I think its the only blu ray release that came out.

Thanks downTYU :)

Gabe - No, there definitely is no US release, the English text "a film by Regis Warnier" precludes it from being a French or Italian release, and the lack of age advisories means it's not a UK or German release. Strange. Well, thanks again.
